title: Linkwarden LXC
textContent:
Linkwarden LXC 
                Linkwarden is a fully
                    self-hostable, open-source collaborative bookmark manager to collect, organize and archive webpages.
                
                To create a new Proxmox VE Linkwarden LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell. 
                
                Copybash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/linkwarden.sh)"
                ⚡ Default Settings: 2GB RAM - 8GB Storage - 2vCPU ⚡
                Linkwarden Interface: IP:3000
                Show Database/Adminer Credentials: cat linkwarden.creds
outerHTML:
Linkwarden LXC

Linkwarden is a fully self-hostable, open-source collaborative bookmark manager to collect, organize and archive webpages.

To create a new Proxmox VE Linkwarden LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell. 

bash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/linkwarden.sh)"

⚡ Default Settings: 2GB RAM - 8GB Storage - 2vCPU ⚡

Linkwarden Interface: IP:3000

Show Database/Adminer Credentials: cat linkwarden.creds
